_header: With salt tears overflowing of woeful grievance
Subjects: lovers, addresses to beloved; love lyrics; absence/separation of lovers
_description: The penitent lover to his beloved — three stanzas rhyme royal with refrain, Anima mea turbata est or Anima mea liquefacta est

CamTCC599.First Lines:
With salt teares urflowyng of wofull grevaunceDynt as a carfull
                    caytyf in captivite…
CamTCC599.Last Lines:
…Yeveth to her whom I wyll love bestTyll by syght of her
                        Anima mea liquefacta est

             Medium Ævum
